articles.title: Read the statement from Arthur T. Demoulas’s camp after Market Basket firing
articles.description:
“Mr. Demoulas’ passion for the company and his care for the associates remains unchanged,” a spokesperson for the ousted CEO said Wednesday.

The post Read the statement from Arthur T. Demoulas’s camp after Market Basket firing appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Arthur T. Demoulas was ousted as CEO of Market Basket on September 10, 2025.
Demoulas's spokesperson emphasized his continued commitment to company associates.
The firing may affect employee morale and customer loyalty in Boston stores.

articles.title: Eagles’ Jalen Carter loses $57,222 for spitting on Cowboys QB Dak Prescott
articles.description:
“It was a mistake that happened on my side. It won’t happen again,” Carter said after the game.

The post Eagles’ Jalen Carter loses $57,222 for spitting on Cowboys QB Dak Prescott appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Eagles' Jalen Carter fined $57,222 for spitting on Cowboys QB Dak Prescott.
Carter admitted it was a mistake and vowed it won't happen again.
This incident may affect fan perceptions of player conduct in Boston.

articles.title: Here’s why you’ll likely see long lines at Anna’s Taqueria locations today
articles.description:
The local chain of Mexican eateries is celebrating 30 years with a special promotion.

The post Here’s why you’ll likely see long lines at Anna’s Taqueria locations today appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Anna's Taqueria celebrates 30 years with a special promotion today.
Expect long lines at all locations due to increased customer turnout.
Residents can enjoy discounted super burritos as part of the celebration.
